title: If you change name in game ....
body:
If you change your name in game, and you have already posted in the forums, does your name on the post change also? or does it just stay as your previous name ?

just to clear up , I mean like if I posted something a week ago, does the name on that change to my new game name or will stay the same?

replies.body: Your summoner name on the boards will be updated to reflect your new name.  Your older posts will reflect your new name.   It may not happen right away though!   Sometimes, an account will need to sync up with the boards so it can take a little bit.  Let me know if that clears things up!
